channel.title: Common client error
channel.description:
hello guys, i have a simple question that i need answered. Okay before i begin i feel very stupid asking this because it's so easy to fix, however its still giving me an error when i try to.
when i try to run a server client (its a 317) when i click on the run.bat it'll say "java path not specified blablabla" so i right click and edit to put in the JDK that i have it still says error java path cannot be specified. can someoen please tell me how i can fix this? ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ fix this problem up there**** new issue!
when i try to run the client i get this issue please help me
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/148/unledlsp.png/][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/5351/unledlsp.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: Common client error
item.dc:creator: @anti-crime anti-crime
item.description:
@anti-crime wrote:

haha no lie just before you posted this i just found it, i apologize for me being an idiot on that one haha. what should i do once i’m done doing this? it says…

public static String findcachedir()
{
String as[] = {
“c:/windows/”, “c:/winnt/”, “d:/windows/”, “d:/winnt/”, “e:/windows/”, “e:/winnt/”, “f:/windows/”, “f:/winnt/”, “c:/”, “~/”,
“/tmp/”, “”, “c:/rscache”, “/rscache”

Read full topic

item.title: Common client error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

anti-crime:

i did make my java path variable work for my computer, and i put the cache in a folder in my C:/windows since that where everyone says to put it. Should i put it somewhere else?

There is no reason to but it in C:\windows. Move it to your home folder (Users/Your name here), then change the findcachedir method in signlink.java to point to the new location. No I will not help you with Teamviewer.

Read full topic

item.title: Common client error
item.dc:creator: @anti-crime anti-crime
item.description:
@anti-crime wrote:

i did make my java path variable work for my computer, and i put the cache in a folder in my C:/windows since that where everyone says to put it. Should i put it somewhere else?

Read full topic

item.title: Common client error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

First problem: Add java to your PATH environment variable (there’s a tutorial in the Tutorials section)
Second problem: Your cache is probably in the wrong directory. Post your findcachedir method from signlink.java here.

Read full topic
